preqs: Students must have passed either ETF2100, ETF9100, ETF5910 or equivalent or must be enrolled in course 3822 or 4412.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {3822, 4412, B6001} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETF2100, ETF5910, ETF9100} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ETC3410, ETF3200, ETF5920, ETF9200}

description: This unit presents econometric models and techniques that are widely used in applied econometrics. The topics covered are linear regression models with random regressors, method of moments and instrumental variables estimations; simultaneous equations models; models for time-series data; introduction to maximum likelihood estimation; models for discrete dependent variables and models for panel data. EViews computer software is used to carry out data analysis and estimation.
